name: Midway Arcade Treasures: Extended Play
description:
Arcade Action Anywhere! Now you can play Midway's classic arcade games anywhere. Anytime. Enjoy the coin-op masterpieces of the past like Mortal Kombat, Gauntlet and Xenophobe with multiplayer wireless support! Tons of portable arcade fun for any gaming fan!

MIDWAY ARCADE TREASURES EXTENDED PLAY© 2005, 2010 Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. Portions of this game converted by Backbone Entertainment. The following titles are trademark and copyright Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.: Spy Hunter © 1984; Joust © 1982; Sinistar © 1982; Defender © 1980, Arch Rivals © 1989; Rampage © 1986; Xenophobe © 1987; Mortal Kombat © 1992; Mortal Kombat II © 1993; Mortal Kombat III © 1995; and Wizard of Wor © 1981; Gauntlet © 1984; Paperboy © 1985, 1999; Marble Madness © 1984; Rampart © 1991; 720° © 1 9 8 6 ; T o obin' © 1988; KLAX © 1989; Xybots © 1987; Championship Sprint © 1986; and Cyberball 2072 © 1989.
